SemanticAnalyzer - Class in jointyc.analysis.semantic
Implements a visiting machinery of the syntax tree to apply semantic actions, defined by the interpreter associated at construction time.

SyntaxTree - Interface in jointyc.analysis.parser
Defines a recursive data structure, an m-ary tree, used to represent the source string, according to the grammar implemented by a parser.
